languages.text: Реликварий разбит, а священный прах прошлых Вольных Торговцев и их слуг похищен.

traits.locale_text: Реликварий разбит, а священный прах прошлых Вольных Торговцев и их слуг похищен.

languages.text: The reliquary has been ransacked and the sacred ashes of past Rogue Traders and their servants stolen.
languages.original_text: Реликварий разбит, а священный прах прошлых Вольных Торговцев и их слуг похищен.

traits.locale_text: The reliquary has been ransacked and the sacred ashes of past Rogue Traders and their servants stolen.

languages.text: Le reliquaire a été saccagé et les cendres sacrées des défunts libres-marchands et de leurs serviteurs ont été volées.
languages.original_text: The reliquary has been ransacked and the sacred ashes of past Rogue Traders and their servants stolen.

traits.locale_text: Le reliquaire a été saccagé et les cendres sacrées des défunts libres-marchands et de leurs serviteurs ont été volées.

languages.text: El relicario ha sido saqueado y las sagradas cenizas de anteriores Comerciantes Independientes han sido robadas.
languages.original_text: The reliquary has been ransacked and the sacred ashes of past Rogue Traders and their servants stolen.

traits.locale_text: El relicario ha sido saqueado y las sagradas cenizas de anteriores Comerciantes Independientes han sido robadas.

languages.text: 圣骨匣被洗劫一空，列位行商浪人与仆人的骨灰也被盗走了。
languages.original_text: The reliquary has been ransacked and the sacred ashes of past Rogue Traders and their servants stolen.

traits.locale_text: 圣骨匣被洗劫一空，列位行商浪人与仆人的骨灰也被盗走了。

languages.text: 聖具箱は荒らされ、過去の自由開拓者とその従者たちの聖なる灰が盗まれている。
languages.original_text: The reliquary has been ransacked and the sacred ashes of past Rogue Traders and their servants stolen.

traits.locale_text: 聖具箱は荒らされ、過去の自由開拓者とその従者たちの聖なる灰が盗まれている。

languages.text: Das Reliquiar wurde verwüstet, die heilige Asche früherer Freihändler und ihrer Diener gestohlen.
languages.original_text: The reliquary has been ransacked and the sacred ashes of past Rogue Traders and their servants stolen.

traits.locale_text: Das Reliquiar wurde verwüstet, die heilige Asche früherer Freihändler und ihrer Diener gestohlen.

languages.text: Kutsal emanet odası yağmalanmış. Geçmiş Hür Tacirlerin ve hizmetkârlarının kutsal külleri çalınmış.
